Component.name: LookAt
Component.Description:
Makes an entity continuously rotate to face a target entity. Useful for billboards, NPCs, turrets, or any object that should track another.
Usage: robot.setComponent(LookAt(target = player, speed = 0.2f, axis = LookAtAxis.Y))
System query pattern: Query.where { has(LookAt.id, Transform.id) }
Attributes: - target: The entity to look at (required) - lookAtHead: If true, looks at head position instead of entity origin - axis: LookAtAxis.ALL (full 3D) or LookAtAxis.Y (horizontal only, for grounded objects) - speed: Interpolation speed (0.0-1.0), higher = faster rotation - offset: Position offset from target to look at
